titleStmt.title: An ordinance for the continuance and maintenance of the alms-houses & alms-men called Poor Knights, and other charitable and pious uses, whereof the late dean and canons of Windsor were feoffees in trust
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field ...,

notesStmt.note: "Thursday the fifteenth of February, 1654. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector and the Council that the ordinance ... being passed by His Highness the Lord Protector, with the consent of his Council, on Saturday the second of September, 1655, be printed and published. Hen. Scobell, Clerk of the Council"
Imperfect: filmed copy dark and partially illegible.
